sqlMap.insert: insert into sol_bbs(subject, content, passwd, regdt) values (#subject#, #content#, #passwd#, now())
sqlMap.select: select bbsno, subject, content, passwd, regdt, readcnt from sol_bbs order by bbsno DESC limit #sno#, #numPerPage#
select bbsno, subject, content, passwd, regdt, readcnt, noticeshow from sol_bbs where bbsno=#bbsno#
sqlMap.update: update sol_bbs set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where bbsno=#bbsno#
update sol_bbs set subject=#subject# , content=#content# where bbsno=#bbsno#
update sol_bbs set noticeshow=#noticeshow# where bbsno=#bbsno#
